# 1. Simulate Data

```{r data simulation}
Y <- PhenotypeSimulator::runSimulation(N = 1000, P = 50,  tNrSNP = 10000, 
                           SNPfrequencies = c(0.05, 0.1,0.3,0.4), genVar = 0.4,
                           h2s=0.05, h2bg = 0.95, phi = 0.6,
                           delta=0.4)

```

# 2. Run dimensionality reduction

```{r dimensionality reduction}
dr <- computeDimReduction(Y=Y, method=c("PCA", "LLE", "ICA", "LaplacianEigenmap", 
                                  verbose=TRUE)
```
